title: Serif font suggestion to compliment Vista Sans
content:
Hi there,

Im looking for a ’contemporary’ serif typeface that compliments Vista Sans.  
The two are being used for a Coporate Wellness company.

Thanks  
Julian

 [‹ Make a 'Y' symbolise sharing](http://web.archive.org/web/20080119232149/http:/typophile.com/node/40971 "Go to previous forum topic") [The Rivalry ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080119232149/http:/typophile.com/node/40928 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Julian_N

comments.content:
We’ve found that [Malaga](http://web.archive.org/web/20080119232149/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/emigre/malaga_volume/), [Xavier Dupré](http://web.archive.org/web/20080119232149/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Xavier%252BDupr%2525C3%2525A9)’s other typeface for Emigre, works well as a companion to his Vista Sans. See it in practice in our [November 07 calendar](http://web.archive.org/web/20080119232149/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontfeed/archives/2007-fontshop-calendar-november/).

Dupré’s [Zingha](http://web.archive.org/web/20080119232149/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=Zingha) and [FF Reminga](http://web.archive.org/web/20080119232149/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_reminga/) are other serifs infused with his signature flavors.
